title: Off
subtle: Concept (fiction), 24 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR60L
description: Cats can be very energetic and jump off objects all around the house! In the story Off, students will read a repetitive text about a mischievous cat. Students will also focus on retelling to understand the text as well as identifying the high-frequency word off.
reviewWords: chair, computer, couch, off, step, towel
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word off
